database

Class DatabaseLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.DatabaseLogic

  • public class DatabaseLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all database interactions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void delete(java.lang.String input, java.lang.String choice)
      Deletes a record from the database depending on the input and choice argument selections.
      static void insert(java.util.ArrayList<Book> bookList)
      Inserts all the books from the bookList argument into the database.
      static void select()
      Queries the database and sets the book list in memory to database's current book list.
      static void update(java.lang.String input, java.lang.String choice, java.lang.String status, java.time.LocalDate dueDate)
      Updates a record's status and dueDate from the database, depending on the input and choice argument selections.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • select

        public static void select()
        Queries the database and sets the book list in memory to database's current book list.

      • insert

        public static void insert(java.util.ArrayList<Book> bookList)
        Inserts all the books from the bookList argument into the database.
        Parameters:
        bookList - The list of books to insert into the database.

      • delete

        public static void delete(java.lang.String input,
                          java.lang.String choice)
        Deletes a record from the database depending on the input and choice argument selections.
        Parameters:
        input - The input string that should match a record in the database.
        choice - The choice of title or ID to compare the input to.

      • update

        public static void update(java.lang.String input,
                          java.lang.String choice,
                          java.lang.String status,
                          java.time.LocalDate dueDate)
        Updates a record's status and dueDate from the database, depending on the input and choice argument selections.
        Parameters:
        input - The input string that should match a record in the database.
        choice - The choice of title or ID to compare the input to.
        status - The new status to change the selected book to.
        dueDate - The new due date to change the selected book to.
